definition.text: Specialization is a very interesting concept that may lead to designing more efficient trading systems!

paragraphs.text: It is a well-known fact that most strategies perform better on certain market conditions.
Like with BB Top Bounce, a single trading system may feature multiple strategies, each specializing in specific trends, volatility ranges, or any other market parameter.
Instead of designing a strategy to evaluate a range of market conditions, keep them focused!
